pages.text: In order to make any progress here, I will need to discover and artificially create $(marked)Essences$().ยง(br)In order to do so, I will have to dedicate myself to $(marked)Matter Manipulation$(), starting with $(l:alchemy/entry_clusters)$(item)Unrefined Clusters$() to create $(l:lessons/lesson_collection)$(marked)Primal Essences$()

Once I have discovered a primal essence, it should be easier to discover other ways of matter manipulation, so that I can create simple compound essences. $(br)Once I have a lot of those, I can dedicate myself to the more complex compounds, like the Soul aspect.$(br2)$(o)(Looking at the Advancements of this mod will help you make progress.)
